lines: I seek Man-flesh!
I smell Man-flesh!
Where is the Man-flesh?
What do you want?
I've had nothing but maggoty bread for three stinking days!
Maggoty bread again? Give me some Man-flesh!
I can't wait to get my teeth into some Man-flesh!
What are you after?
The air is foul here.
We shall break their bones and feast on their flesh!
Death to the lands of Men! Death to the filthy Elves!
Death to the line of Durin!
These rags stink!
The world of Men shall be broken and destroyed.
Ruin! Ruin to the free peoples!
Man-flesh!
Where's the nearest Man-flesh? I'm starving here!
Remember who it was that took the Mountain from the filthy Dwarves!
We drove the Dwarves out of all their mountain-mines! And they're never coming back!
We serve a common purpose, #p.
We shall swarm into the lands of the free peoples like a plague! Leave nothing alive!
Our Wargs are the fiercest, nastiest wolves of all the Goblin-clans!
Whom do you serve?
You ain't fit to ride the meanest Warg!
Get out of my sight, worm!
Get back to work, Snaga-scum!
You stink like a Snaga!
Our Wargs are nasty brutes! So watch out, or I'll set them on you! Ha!
Stay in line, #p, or the Uruks will sort you out!
Soon, #p! Soon we will raid the filthy sons of Men!
You're not bad for a Man!
You're not bad for a Man, #p! Even if you do have an air of Ranger about you!
Filthy maggot! Oh, it's you, #p...
You still don't look like a Goblin-Man, #p!
Get readying yourself for war! There's always one on the way!
If you can get me some Man-flesh, I won't eat you instead! Ha! Ha!
What are you after, maggot?
Follow your orders, scum!
Don't just stand there! Do something!
I don't trust you, maggot!
Move along, scum!
Are you trying to start a fight?
I don't trust filthy Men!
At your service, #p!
What orders from the Mountain, #p?
The Uruks speak highly of you, #p.
Oi! Watch yer mouth!
Something smells disgusting here. It's you, #p! Go away!
You stink!
You smell like a rotten maggot!
You don't look like a Goblin-Man!
Do you want something?
What orders from Gundabad?
What orders from Gundabad, #p?
What do the Bosses command?
At your service, maggot! - I mean - #p!
I'll let the boys know it's time for an inspection!
I'll have your Warg made ready at once!
So? Are you the new Boss?
We march to war at your command!
Lead us to the ends of the earth, #p!
I'll bleed you like a stuck pig!
Enjoy your last breath, scum!
You're nice and fresh!
Kill the scum!
Looks like meat's back on the menu, boys!
You stink of fear!
Die, Man-scum!
Your blood smells fresh!
I'll skewer you like a piece of meat!
You'd better start running, maggot!
Come any closer and I'll stick you like a fresh cut of meat!
We dine on Man-flesh tonight!
Once I'm done with you, you'll be nothing but a pile of bones!
I will feast on your flesh, Man-filth!
I'll make dinner out of you!
You've messed with the wrong Orc, Man-scum!
I will have your head, scum!
Filthy maggot tried to knife me!
Ranger scum! Come on, boys!
Worm!
Scum!
Maggot!
Snaga-filth!
I'll set the Wargs on you!
Our Wargs will sort you out!
You stink of Warg-dung!
You'll end up like the Dwarves of Moria!
Get 'im, boys!
Get 'er, boys!
Have you not been driven out by our armies yet, scum?
Oath-breaking scum!
Oath-breaker! Snaga-filth!
We'll feast on your bones, traitor!
What are your orders, my lord?
You may be my commander, #p, but you're still a filthy maggot!
Lead us on the raid, #p!
The air is ripe with the stink of fear!
The free peoples of the earth shall fall before our might!
Death! Death to all who oppose us!
Shall we hunt some Man-flesh, #p?
My stomach is dying for Man-flesh!
I am ready to hunt some Man-scum.
Death to those filthy Rangers and all their filthy friends!
Let us wreak havoc upon the world of Men!
Let's hunt some Men!
Stinking Rangers don't know what's coming for them!
Call the boys! We march to war!
Call the Wargs!
Let's hunt some Dwarves!
